de.mdelab.simulator.validators.events

Class ValidatorChangeEventObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.AdapterImpl
      • org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EContentAdapter
        • de.mdelab.simulator.validators.events.ValidatorChangeEventObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter.Internal

    public class ValidatorChangeEventObserver
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EContentAdapter
    Collects change events of the model. These change events are caused by the feedback loop and they are used internally by the simulator to validate a self-adaptation performed by the feedback loop.
    Version:
    0.41
    Author:
    thomas vogel

    • Method Detail

      • notifyChanged

        public void notifyChanged(org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notification notification)
        Filters relevant notifications and adds corresponding events to the queues. Currently, only ComponentStateChangeEvents and ReroutingEvents are collected as they are required by the current validation performed by the simulator.
        Specified by:
        notifyChanged in interface org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter
        Overrides:
        notifyChanged in class org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EContentAdapter
        See Also:
        EContentAdapter.notifyChanged(Notification)
